data.actual_result: The track duration to the right gets cut off if zooming out below default, everything track related disappears if zooming in above default.
data.expected_result: The embed becomes bigger/smaller and scales properly
data.short_description: Changing zoom levels from default misaligns the Spotify playlist embeds
data.steps_to_repro: - Paste a spotify playlist into any channel (embed enabled) - Once the embed shows up, zoom in/out
